traits.name: Keen Smell
entries: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

actions.name: Cloud of Dust
entries: On its first turn in combat or when it is reduced to 0 hit points, the cat expels a cloud of dust that acts as dust of sneezing and choking
